data.comment: Today's referee, Fernando Hernandez Gomez, has blown to start the match.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Leon.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Angel Mena (Leon) has received a yellow card from Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
In the minute 4, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Throw-in high up the field for Juarez in Ciudad Juarez.
Free kick Juarez.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maximiliano Olivera for Juarez has been booked by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jose Rodriguez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leon.
In the minute 13, Leon have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 15, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 17, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
Juarez's Flavio Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leon defender.
In the minute 19, Juarez have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 20, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Juarez throw-in in Leon's half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon's David Ramirez breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Juarez.
In the minute 22, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Fernando Hernandez Gomez.
Juarez's Gustavo Velazquez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 30, Leon have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Juarez.
In Ciudad Juarez Leon attack through Emanuel Gigliotti. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 31, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Leon's Joel Campbell gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 34, Free kick Juarez.
Yairo Moreno (Leon) gets a yellow card.
Juarez pushes forward through Gustavo Velazquez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Juarez.
Leon have a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 39, Dario Lezcano of Juarez smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Flavio Santos (Juarez) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 42, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
At Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez, Jose Rodriguez has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 44, Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a Juarez throw-in in Leon's half.
Juarez are pushing forward but Marco Fabian's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
David Ramirez for Leon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 46, Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Juarez.
In the minute 47, Leon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
Juarez drive upfield and Flavio Santos gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leon defender.
In the minute 49, Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez's Flavio Santos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leon have a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Ball safe as Juarez is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 54, In Ciudad Juarez Leon's Angel Mena is caught offside.
Leon needs to be cautious. Juarez have an attacking throw-in.
Juarez drives forward and Maximiliano Olivera gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 56, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards the away team a throw-in.
Dario Lezcano for Juarez gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 58, Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Leon.
In Ciudad Juarez Leon attack through Angel Mena. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
In the minute 62, Leon's Fernando Navarro is on target but unsuccessful.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Leon's Fernando Navarro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Jose Rodriguez in Leon has been yellow-carded a second time by Fernando Hernandez Gomez and is being sent off.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
The away team have replaced Emanuel Gigliotti with Pedro Aquino. This is the first substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Throw-in Juarez.
In the minute 70, Juarez to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Juarez's Flavio Santos is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 78, Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leon drives forward and Joel Campbell gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 80, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leon make their second substitution with Nicolas Sosa replacing Joel Campbell.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leon's Andres Mosquera has been booked in Ciudad Juarez.
Leon pushes forward through Angel Mena, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 84, The match at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez has been interrupted briefly for a check on Eryc Castillo, who is down injured.
Eryc Castillo has recovered and rejoins the match in Ciudad Juarez.
Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) has taken off Eryc Castillo who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Brian Rubio is the replacement.
The home team replace Marco Fabian with Alan Mendoza.
In the minute 85, Luis Hernandez is replacing Alberto Acosta for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 87, Gabriel Caballero (Juarez) is making a third substitution, with Carlos Rosel replacing Dario Lezcano.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leon are coming forward and Luis Montes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 89, Fernando Hernandez Gomez awards Juarez a goal kick.
Fernando Hernandez Gomez signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Leon.
Can Leon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Leon.
Juarez's Bruno Romo breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
Yairo Moreno of Leon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ciudad Juarez.
Leon's Luis Montes has run offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-0.
Osvaldo Rodriguez is replacing Angel Mena for the away team.
